languages.text: "Я не... Я имела в виду..." {n}Сердце пропускает удар, жар окутывает плечи, горло и грудь, голову туманит — уже знакомое влияние сил Кассии пьянит ваш разум больше обычного.{/n} "Мне... спокойно в вашей компании". {n}Кассия отводит взгляд, бледные щеки наливаются легким румянцем.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Я не... Я имела в виду..." {n}Сердце пропускает удар, жар окутывает плечи, горло и грудь, голову туманит — уже знакомое влияние сил Кассии пьянит ваш разум больше обычного.{/n} "Мне... спокойно в вашей компании". {n}Кассия отводит взгляд, бледные щеки наливаются легким румянцем.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I didn't... I only meant that..." {n}Your heart stutters; a searing heat envelops your shoulders, throat, and chest; and your brain grows foggy — the by now familiar influence of Cassia's powers is intoxicating your mind more than usual.{/n} "I am... at ease in your company." {n}Cassia looks away, a subtle blush blooming on her pale cheeks.{/n}

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我不是……我只是想说……”{n}你的心颤抖起来，一股热浪笼罩着你的肩膀、喉咙与胸膛。这是卡西娅的力量，你早已非常熟悉。但此刻，它比平时更加有力，让你的意识迷醉不已。{/n}“我……有你陪伴，我感到很安心。”{n}卡西娅看着远方，苍白的脸颊绽放出了微妙的红晕。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I didn't... I only meant that..." {n}Your heart stutters; a searing heat envelops your shoulders, throat, and chest; and your brain grows foggy — the by now familiar influence of Cassia's powers is intoxicating your mind more than usual.{/n} "I am... at ease in your company." {n}Cassia looks away, a subtle blush blooming on her pale cheeks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我不是……我只是想说……”{n}你的心颤抖起来，一股热浪笼罩着你的肩膀、喉咙与胸膛。这是卡西娅的力量，你早已非常熟悉。但此刻，它比平时更加有力，让你的意识迷醉不已。{/n}“我……有你陪伴，我感到很安心。”{n}卡西娅看着远方，苍白的脸颊绽放出了微妙的红晕。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I didn't... I only meant that..." {n}Your heart stutters; a searing heat envelops your shoulders, throat, and chest; and your brain grows foggy — the by now familiar influence of Cassia's powers is intoxicating your mind more than usual.{/n} "I am... at ease in your company." {n}Cassia looks away, a subtle blush blooming on her pale cheeks.{/n}

languages.text: «Yo no... solo quería decir que...». {n}Tu corazón tartamudea, un dolor abrasador atraviesa tus hombros, tu garganta y tu pecho y tu mente se nubla. La ya familiar influencia de los poderes de Cassia intoxica tu mente más de lo habitual.{/n} «Estoy... tranquila en su compañía». {n}Cassia aparta la mirada con un leve rubor en sus pálidas mejillas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I didn't... I only meant that..." {n}Your heart stutters; a searing heat envelops your shoulders, throat, and chest; and your brain grows foggy — the by now familiar influence of Cassia's powers is intoxicating your mind more than usual.{/n} "I am... at ease in your company." {n}Cassia looks away, a subtle blush blooming on her pale cheeks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Yo no... solo quería decir que...». {n}Tu corazón tartamudea, un dolor abrasador atraviesa tus hombros, tu garganta y tu pecho y tu mente se nubla. La ya familiar influencia de los poderes de Cassia intoxica tu mente más de lo habitual.{/n} «Estoy... tranquila en su compañía». {n}Cassia aparta la mirada con un leve rubor en sus pálidas mejillas.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「そうではなく…私はただ…」{n}あなたの心臓が軋む。焼けつくような熱が肩、喉、胸を包み、頭にもやがかかってくる…カシアの馴染み深い力の影響が、いつも以上にあなたの精神を侵食する。{/n}「私は…あなたといると落ち着くのです」{n}カシアは目をそらし、青白い頬をほのかに赤らめる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I didn't... I only meant that..." {n}Your heart stutters; a searing heat envelops your shoulders, throat, and chest; and your brain grows foggy — the by now familiar influence of Cassia's powers is intoxicating your mind more than usual.{/n} "I am... at ease in your company." {n}Cassia looks away, a subtle blush blooming on her pale cheeks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そうではなく…私はただ…」{n}あなたの心臓が軋む。焼けつくような熱が肩、喉、胸を包み、頭にもやがかかってくる…カシアの馴染み深い力の影響が、いつも以上にあなたの精神を侵食する。{/n}「私は…あなたといると落ち着くのです」{n}カシアは目をそらし、青白い頬をほのかに赤らめる。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Nein ... Ich meinte nur, dass ..." {n}Dein Herz stolpert. Eine sengende Hitze umschließt deine Schultern, deinen Hals, deine Brust. Dein Verstand wird ganz benebelt. Der inzwischen vertraute Einfluss von Cassias Kräften berauscht dich noch stärker als sonst.{/n} "Ich ... fühle mich in Eurer Gesellschaft wohl." {n}Cassia blickt weg. ihre fahlen Wangen nehmen eine leichte Färbung an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I didn't... I only meant that..." {n}Your heart stutters; a searing heat envelops your shoulders, throat, and chest; and your brain grows foggy — the by now familiar influence of Cassia's powers is intoxicating your mind more than usual.{/n} "I am... at ease in your company." {n}Cassia looks away, a subtle blush blooming on her pale cheeks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nein ... Ich meinte nur, dass ..." {n}Dein Herz stolpert. Eine sengende Hitze umschließt deine Schultern, deinen Hals, deine Brust. Dein Verstand wird ganz benebelt. Der inzwischen vertraute Einfluss von Cassias Kräften berauscht dich noch stärker als sonst.{/n} "Ich ... fühle mich in Eurer Gesellschaft wohl." {n}Cassia blickt weg. ihre fahlen Wangen nehmen eine leichte Färbung an.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Je n'ai pas... Je voulais simplement dire... » {n}Vous sentez votre cœur s'emballer et votre cerveau s'embrumer tandis qu'une chaleur intense se diffuse dans vos épaules, votre gorge et votre poitrine. Les pouvoirs de Cassia semblent avoir plus d'emprise sur votre esprit que d'habitude.{/n} « Je suis... à l'aise en votre compagnie. » {n}Elle détourne le regard pour tenter de dissimuler la rougeur qui s'empare de ses joues d'ordinaire pâles.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I didn't... I only meant that..." {n}Your heart stutters; a searing heat envelops your shoulders, throat, and chest; and your brain grows foggy — the by now familiar influence of Cassia's powers is intoxicating your mind more than usual.{/n} "I am... at ease in your company." {n}Cassia looks away, a subtle blush blooming on her pale cheeks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai pas... Je voulais simplement dire... » {n}Vous sentez votre cœur s'emballer et votre cerveau s'embrumer tandis qu'une chaleur intense se diffuse dans vos épaules, votre gorge et votre poitrine. Les pouvoirs de Cassia semblent avoir plus d'emprise sur votre esprit que d'habitude.{/n} « Je suis... à l'aise en votre compagnie. » {n}Elle détourne le regard pour tenter de dissimuler la rougeur qui s'empare de ses joues d'ordinaire pâles.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Öyle demek istemedim... Aslında kastettiğim..." {n}Kalbin tekliyor. Omuzlarını, boğazını ve göğsünü şiddetli bir ateş sarıyor. Beynin bulanıyor. Cassia'nın güçlerinin etkisine aşina olsan da bu kez aklını, her zamankinden daha fazla mest ediyorlar.{/n} "Seninleyken... İçim rahat oluyor." {n}Cassia, bakışlarını kaçırıyor. Solgun yanakları hafifçe kızarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I didn't... I only meant that..." {n}Your heart stutters; a searing heat envelops your shoulders, throat, and chest; and your brain grows foggy — the by now familiar influence of Cassia's powers is intoxicating your mind more than usual.{/n} "I am... at ease in your company." {n}Cassia looks away, a subtle blush blooming on her pale cheeks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Öyle demek istemedim... Aslında kastettiğim..." {n}Kalbin tekliyor. Omuzlarını, boğazını ve göğsünü şiddetli bir ateş sarıyor. Beynin bulanıyor. Cassia'nın güçlerinin etkisi artık tanıdık gelse de, bu kez aklını her zamankinden daha fazla mest ediyor.{/n} "Seninleyken... İçim rahat oluyor." {n}Cassia bakışlarını kaçırıyor. Solgun yanakları hafifçe kızarıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
